description:
Part of prAna's men's Journeyman Collection, this tee is proof that taking the time to design things responsibly is always cool.

The laid-back style of the slim fit Campfire Journeyman tee is a favorite around here, and for good reason. The sustainable, lightweight jersey blend looks as good as it feels, and the fun graphic is perfect for casual wear.

Plus, this style is Fair Trade Certified™. The fabric is made from a blend of recycled polyester and organic cotton which was certified by Fair Trade USA, then made by their Fair Trade Certified™ Factory partners around the globe. Talk about a style that truly feels good.
name: Prana Campfire Journeyman - Mens
